text: "Quarter Past Midnight" is a 2018 song by British band Bastille and is the leading single from their third studio album Doom Days. It went to number 65 in the United Kingdom, number 55 in Scotland, number 76 in the Netherlands and number 29 in Belgium. It also went to number 15 on the Billboard Hot Rock & Alternative Songs charts. ==Track listing== == References == Category:2018 songs Category:Electropop songs Category:Bastille (band) songs
title: Quarter Past Midnight
